description: After your tech layers have had their fun for the day, drop your pack, pop a top, and slide into the Polartec® Dbl Brushed FZ Jacket. Made with a soft and toasty double-brushed Polartec® fleece, this casual jacket is required attire for cool-weather campsite chilling and features 87% recycled polyester, for both a literal and figurative warm, fuzzy feeling.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Double Brushed Full Zip Jacket - Mens
